name: Griffon
description: The Griffon has the body of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle, embodying the fierce traits of both birds and felines.
memorable: A formidable aerial predator capable of executing rapid strikes from above with powerful melee attacks.
goals: To hunt large prey and fiercely defend its territory.
relations: Often found in high mountains or remote wilderness areas, they may be encountered with other large predators.
environment: High mountains or remote wilderness areas
strengths: Exceptional mobility both on the ground and in the air, strong physical presence, and advantage on attack rolls when allies are nearby.
weaknesses: Relatively low Armor Class and lacks magical abilities.
attacks: Multiattack includes a Beak attack and a Claws attack, dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pounce allows rapid strikes, knocking foes prone and capitalizing on their vulnerability.
senses: Keen Sight grants advantage on Perception checks relying on sight, enhancing its ability to detect hidden threats.
skills: Possesses proficient Perception skills, giving it a high capability to notice hidden objects or creatures.
additional_information: Resistant to exhaustion and frightened condition.
Can be trained as mounts by skilled handlers.
Grapple mechanism with an escape DC of 14 adds strategy to combat.
Heightened Sight increases visual perception significantly.
Has a strong combination of physical attributes with notable Strength and Constitution.
test_queries: large creature soaring in the mountains
beast with lion body and eagle head
fierce monster that hunts large prey
aerial predator with keen sight ability
